price: Et ils ne t’apporteront aucune parabole, sans que Nous ne t’apportions la vérité avec la meilleure interprétation.
arabic: وَلَا يَأۡتُونَكَ بِمَثَلٍ إِلَّا جِئۡنَٰكَ بِٱلۡحَقِّ وَأَحۡسَنَ تَفۡسِيرًا

version.title: French Translation - Muhammad Hamidullah
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French by Muhammad Hamidullah. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: walā yatūnaka bimathalin illā ji'nāka bil-ḥaqi wa-aḥsana tafsīran
